unRegisteredEmailError: We don’t recognise that email or username. You can try again or register for an account
emptyEmailError: Something's missing. Please check and try again.
specialCharsEmailError: Sorry, that email doesn’t look right. Please check it's a proper email.
invalidPasswordError: Sorry, that password isn't valid. Please include a letter.
wrongPasswordError: That password isn’t right. You can try again or reset your password
shortPasswordError: Sorry, that password is too short. It needs to be eight characters or more.
